summary: DEFECT WITH TOYOTA SIENNA POWER DOOR. THE DOOR MOTOR / TRAIN MECHANISM IS PRONE TO BREAKING LEAVING THE DOOR STUCK IN AN OPEN POSITION. THITS MAKES THE CAR UNUSABLE AND/OR VERY UNSAFE.
